promise-inflight

One promise for multiple requests in flight to avoid async duplication

USAGE

```javascript const inflight = require(‘promise-inflight’)

// some request that does some stuff function req(key) { // key is any random string. like a url or filename or whatever. return inflight(key, () => { // this is where you’d fetch the url or whatever return Promise.delay(100) }) }

// only assigns a single setTimeout // when it dings, all thens get called with the same result. (There’s only // one underlying promise.) req(‘foo’).then(…) req(‘foo’).then(…) req(‘foo’).then(…) req(‘foo’).then(…) ```

SEE ALSO

  • inflight - For the callback based function on which this is based.

STILL NEEDS
